tool.name: SAGA.table_calculus.5
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayFIELD False isArrayFIELD_MEAN False isArrayFIELD_MEDIAN False isArrayFIELD_MIN False isArrayFIELD_MAX False isArrayFIELD_STDV False isArrayFIELD_STDV_LO False isArrayFIELD_STDV_HI False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.table_calculus.5 INPUT $INPUT FIELD $FIELD RANGE $RANGE MEAN $MEAN FIELD_MEAN $FIELD_MEAN MEDIAN $MEDIAN FIELD_MEDIAN $FIELD_MEDIAN MIN $MIN FIELD_MIN $FIELD_MIN MAX $MAX FIELD_MAX $FIELD_MAX STDV $STDV FIELD_STDV $FIELD_STDV STDV_LO $STDV_LO FIELD_STDV_LO $FIELD_STDV_LO STDV_HI $STDV_HI FIELD_STDV_HI $FIELD_STDV_HI prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Field
param.help: Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: RANGE
param.label: Range of Records
param.help: The number of preceding and following records to be taken into account for statistics. The total number is one plus two times the range.

param.name: FIELD_MEAN
param.label: Mean
param.help: Mean The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_MEDIAN
param.label: Median
param.help: Median The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_MIN
param.label: Minimum
param.help: Minimum The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_MAX
param.label: Maximum
param.help: Maximum The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_STDV
param.label: Standard Deviation
param.help: Standard Deviation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_STDV_LO
param.label: Lower Standard Deviation
param.help: Lower Standard Deviation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_STDV_HI
param.label: Higher Standard Deviation
param.help: Higher Standard Deviation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
